com.kaisoon

Class RSA

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kaisoon.RSA

  • public class RSA
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RSA()
      Instantiate an RSA object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String decrypt(java.math.BigInteger cipherText)
      decrypt() converts a cipherText back into its original string message
      java.lang.String decrypt(java.math.BigInteger cipherText, java.math.BigInteger[] privateKey)
      decrypt() converts a string into a cipherText in the form of a BigInteger with a provided public key
      java.math.BigInteger encrypt(java.lang.String message)
      encrypt() converts a string into a cipher-text in the form of a BigInteger with the generated public key and modulus
      java.math.BigInteger encrypt(java.lang.String message, java.math.BigInteger[] publicKey)
      encrypt() converts a string into a cipherText in the form of a BigInteger with a provided public key
      void generateKeys()
      generateKeys() generates the e, d, and N values that are components of public/private key pair.
      java.math.BigInteger[] getPrivateKey() 
      java.math.BigInteger[] getPublicKey() 

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • RSA

        public RSA()
        Instantiate an RSA object. No keys are generated until the the generateKeys() method it called. Getters for keys will return null if no keys have been generated in the object.

    • Method Detail

      • getPublicKey

        public java.math.BigInteger[] getPublicKey()
        Returns:
        An array of two BigIntegers which is public key pair generated.

      • getPrivateKey

        public java.math.BigInteger[] getPrivateKey()
        Returns:
        An array of two BigIntegers which is private key pair generated.

      • generateKeys

        public void generateKeys()
        generateKeys() generates the e, d, and N values that are components of public/private key pair. Public and private key can be accessed with getter methods.

      • encrypt

        public java.math.BigInteger encrypt(java.lang.String message)
        encrypt() converts a string into a cipher-text in the form of a BigInteger with the generated public key and modulus
        Parameters:
        message - is the string message to be encrypted
        Returns:
        A BitInteger cipherText if keys are generated and encryption is successful

      • encrypt

        public java.math.BigInteger encrypt(java.lang.String message,
                                    java.math.BigInteger[] publicKey)
        encrypt() converts a string into a cipherText in the form of a BigInteger with a provided public key
        Parameters:
        message - is the string message to be encrypted
        publicKey - is a array consisting of [publicKey, modulus]
        Returns:
        A BitInteger cipherText

      • decrypt

        public java.lang.String decrypt(java.math.BigInteger cipherText)
        decrypt() converts a cipherText back into its original string message
        Parameters:
        cipherText - is a BigInteger cipherText
        Returns:
        The original string message if keys are generated and decryption is successful

      • decrypt

        public java.lang.String decrypt(java.math.BigInteger cipherText,
                                java.math.BigInteger[] privateKey)
        decrypt() converts a string into a cipherText in the form of a BigInteger with a provided public key
        Parameters:
        cipherText - is a BigInteger cipherText
        privateKey - is a array consisting of [privateKey, modulus]
        Returns:
        The original string message
